item.title: MLB The Show 26 announced
item.content:encoded:
A first look at what's to come.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer San Diego Studio have officially announced MLB The Show 26. Platforms and a release date were not announced.

“Our mission has always been to create a baseball experience that resonates with everyone from longtime veterans of the franchise to brand-new players picking up the game for the first time,” San Diego Studio said in the announcement. “And this year, the team brought fresh ways for you to enjoy the sport you love.”

The developer continued, “The development team really leaned in, bringing fans all-new ways to enjoy their favorite sport from Road To The Show’s new high school and college journeys, to Diamond Dynasty’s exciting new experiences in Diamond Quest and Weekend Classic.

“We introduced gameplay innovations with ShowTech, like revamping the throw meter and adding hundreds of new animations. We also made the offseason more strategic and rewarding in Franchise Mode and proudly continued our commitment to storytelling and baseball history with another season of Storylines presents The Negro Leagues.”

Get the first details below.

■ MLB The Show 26, Building on Wins, Tackling Feedback, and Continuing Progress

Last year, we shared information earlier in the season and we aim to continue that going forward. With that said, see below for a sneak peek at a few of our areas of focus for MLB The Show 26:

  • Gameplay – Gameplay continues to focus on delivering the most authentic on-field baseball experience. We’re focusing on advanced logic and new data metrics… redefining ratings, pitch effects, and bat ball physics.
  • Diamond Dynasty – Now and Later Packs are just the beginning. We will continue delivering engaging content for players to live their MLB fantasy as well as new ways to play and use your squads.
  • Road To The Show – Experience the ultimate player’s path; building off MLB The Show 25, MLB The Show 26 takes Road To The Show further than ever before, with a suite of new colleges and a focus on the mid-to-late career.
  • Franchise – Continue evolving the front office experience by building deeper, more immersive, and challenging systems shaped by community feedback.
  • Storylines: The Negro Leagues Season 4 – Celebrate the rich history of baseball with the continuation of Storylines: The Negro Leagues, the award-winning mode that invites fans to take the field and play in the moments that shaped the careers of some of the sport’s most talented yet often overlooked legends.

This is just the start—stay tuned for more as we head into 2026.

Want to stay in the loop and help us improve? Sign up for MLB The Show‘s The Scouting Report for exclusive surveys to share your feedback, get updates, and more.

And… if you just happen to be jumping back into MLB The Show 25, there is no better time than now, as “Now & Later” Packs are back this year with a new way to earn as you continue enjoying live content into the new year.

■ Jump Start Your Journey in MLB The Show 26 With Up to 26 “The Show” Packs!

What are “Now & Later” Packs?

“Now & Later” Packs contain items you’ve come to expect “now” from “The Show” Packs in MLB The Show 25 with the added bonus of allowing you to redeem a “The Show” Pack “later” in MLB The Show 26 at no additional cost.

How Do I Earn “Now & Later” Packs?

  • Sign Up for The Scouting Report
    • Those who subscribe by Friday, November 14 at 11:59 p.m. PT will earn five “Now & Later” Packs! Your future self will thank you for this head start in MLB The Show 26!
  • Play Diamond Dynasty Content in MLB The Show 25
  • Earn additional “Now & Later” Packs in MLB The Show 25 starting Friday, November 21
  • Here’s the content forecast:
    • Friday, November 21: “Now & Later” Packs in the 11th Inning XP Path
    • Early 2026: “Now & Later” Packs in a dedicated Now & Later Program

What Do I Get in MLB The Show 26?

Each “Now & Late”r Pack you earn in MLB The Show 25 will give out a “Now & Later” voucher that will automatically be redeemed into “The Show” Packs when logging into MLB The Show 26 during its standard release. Make sure you log into MLB The Show 26 with the same account you used to earn “Now & Later” Packs in MLB The Show 25!

While that’s all for today, in the meantime, get a head start and get ready to start earning those “Now & Later” Packs in MLB The Show 25!

item.title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition launches December 4
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

A $10 upgrade from the Switch version.

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition will launch digitally for Switch 2 on December 4, SEGA announced. A physical release will follow in early 2026. Users who already own the Switch version will be able to upgrade via an Upgrade Pack for $10, which will be available for 50 percent-off until December 10. Users who buy the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition will also receive the downloadable content “Werehog Pack” as a bonus until December 17.

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on September 25, and has sold over one million units.

item.title: Survival horror game Fright Train announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
Caput Mortum and Born of Bread developer WildArts has announced Fright Train, a train survival horror game set on a train overtaken by monsters in Antarctica. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Fight through a train overtaken by monsters and survive Antarctica’s cold as paranormal special agent Doug Barker in this chilling single-player third-person survival horror game.

Setting

You are rookie agent Doug Barker, and you have just started working for P.A.W. (Paranormal Agency Worldwide).

An anonymous distress signal has been sent from the L.R.S. Great White, a mysterious research station on rails in Antarctica owned by the secretive corporation SHARK.

With the help of your navigator back at HQ, make your way through the train and stop the interdimensional horrors that SHARK unleashed!

But remember to keep it running! If it stops, you might freeze to death or risk being overwhelmed by horrifying monsters…

Gameplay

Make your way through the locomotive research station by solving puzzles and unlocking new areas while fighting back frost zombies and monsters! Whatever you do, don’t let the train stop!

  • Explore a high-speed locomotive as it tears through the Antarctic ice cap.
  • Monitor the train’s equipment as it deteriorates.
  • Repair minor malfunctions before they become major.
  • Jack into encrypted terminals and interface with the train’s systems.
  • Survive the cold and fight off the horrifying creatures that lurk outside.

Key Features

  • Intense gore and a gorgeous mid-2000s-inspired aesthetic.
  • Meaningful and tactical inventory management.
  • A volatile combat ecosystem in which enemy behaviors intertwine, allowing them to support or sabotage one another.
  • A chilling story that doesn’t take itself too seriously.
